name: Flapping Budgies
description:
Tired of flappy bird? Play this instead!

FEATURES:
  • Clean graphics
  • Smooth gameplay
  • Better physics
  • Highscore and medal system
  • Full customization
  • Fullscreen mode
  • Available for Android
CONTROLS:
  • Left Click, Spacebar, or Up Arrow Key to Flap
  • R to restart the game

Game made by Shayan Faysal
Inspired by Flappy Bird
